main event: On October 8, 1954, several witnesses, including a businessman and his wife, observed an elongated, color-changing object in the sky near Union City, Indiana.
interesting points: The object changed color from bright white to bright red during the sighting,The object appeared to float toward the ground and was described as oval-shaped and dark in color,It was observed in the sky for approximately 10-15 minutes,The report concluded that the object was likely a meteor or known astronomical phenomenon,There were no corroborating reports or physical evidence to confirm the sighting.
sighted object: an elongated, oval-shaped object that changed colors
witness description: a businessman and his wife driving along a highway
